sub_title: Regional Legal Manager bij Ricoh Europe
summary:
Areas of expertise: 
- contract law
- corporate litigation
- directors'​ and officers'​ liability
- disputes financial services
- financial regulations
- general terms & conditions
- insolvency
- mismanagement
- product liability
- professional liability (e.g. accountants)
- recovery and collection 
- restructuring
- shareholders' disputes

projects.title: NU Ondernemen! (netwerk dat werkt)
projects.description:
NU Ondernemen is een actief regionaal business netwerk waarin professionals vol energie samenwerken. NU Ondernemen bevordert ondernemerschap, inspireert en ondersteunt professionals om meer rendement te realiseren.

NU Ondernemen komt elke week op woensdagmorgen bijeen tijdens een ontbijt-bijeenkomst. Daarbij werken we volgens een thematische aanpak met een gevarieerd en inspirerend programma. Deelnemers zijn toonaangevende bedrijven, innovatieve ondernemers en professionals die samen hun krachten bundelen. Tezamen vormen we een mooie afspiegeling van de regionale bedrijvigheid.

www.nuondernemen.nu

contributors.headline: Regional Legal Manager bij Ricoh Europe
Directeur/Eigenaar at Nautiek Trainingen BV and SureSecure

profile_positions.title: Regional Legal Manager

profile_positions.description: In-house lawyer, registered at the Dutch Bar, providing advice and assistance to management, business and legal teams of the group companies with focus on Dutch operating company in all aspects of law, particularly  (international / commercial) contract law, corporate law and liability law.
profile_positions.title: Group Legal Counsel

profile_positions.description: Lawyer at law firm, registered at the Dutch Bar, providing advice and assistance to medium-sized to large companies both in court and outside in all aspects of (international) contract law, company law, liability law and professional liability and disciplinary law of accountants, tax advisors etc. Manage, coach and counsel new trainees / lawyers in their first year working for the company. Teacher VIL Academy.
profile_positions.title: Lawyer - corporate law / liability / civil litigation

profile_positions.description: Legal counsel providing advice and assistance to companies both in court and outside on debt collection and the execution of judgments and for that purpose assessing commercial contracts, deeds, judgments etc. Managing the debt and collection team and the execution team.
profile_positions.title: Legal Counsel - contract law / recovery
